page.title: 03HOUSING
page.content: There are three main areas of residential accommodation:{the main {town,}bordered by the Thanet Way, the villages of {Herne}and{Broomfield,}and a development south of the Thanet Way known as {Greenhill}. The central town comprises mainly second world war houses.Whereas {Herne,Broomfield and {Greenhill}have many modern houses built on new estates surrounding older village housing. 45%of properties surveyed were over 30 year old whilst 55% were newer. At houses surveyed 69% of the people had lived in their homes less than 10 yrs, this being consistant with the increase in new residential areas. 91% of the properties belonged to owner occupiers, only 9% was rented accommodation.
